page.title: 03ELDWICK FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: {Eldwick First School}is near the centre of the village,beside the main road.The{children are aged 4to9 years old.There are about{280 on roll}with {Mrs Hall and ten teachers.}The school} opened in{1877}but has grown,mostly during the last twenty years.Today in the main building there is a {classroom, a Hall,}two cloakrooms and four toilets,an office and a staffroom.Then there is a{playground and in the playground there are two {temporary classrooms.}Near one of these classrooms there is a path which leads to{two wooden classrooms. There are some steps which lead down to the wooden classrooms.On the right there is a large house which once belonged to the headteacher but now belongs to the caretaker.There is a {two storey block for four classes,then {a playground,a grassy hill and field.
